00023 //!ITC503 Oxford
00024 class XITC503 : public XOxfordDriver<XTempControl>
00025 {
00026     XNODE_OBJECT
00027 protected:
00028     XITC503(const char *name, bool runtime,
00029             const shared_ptr<XScalarEntryList> &scalarentries,
00030             const shared_ptr<XInterfaceList> &interfaces,
00031             const shared_ptr<XThermometerList> &thermometers,
00032             const shared_ptr<XDriverList> &drivers);
00033 public:
00034     ~XITC503() {}
00035 
00036 protected:
00037     virtual double getRaw(shared_ptr<XChannel> &channel);
00038     //! obtain current heater power
00039     //! \sa m_heaterPowerUnit()
00040     virtual double getHeater();
00041     //! ex. "W", "dB", or so
00042     virtual const char *m_heaterPowerUnit() {return "%";}
00043   
00044     //! Be called just after opening interface. Call start() inside this routine appropriately.
00045     virtual void open() throw (XInterface::XInterfaceError &);
00046   
00047     virtual void onPChanged(double p);
00048     virtual void onIChanged(double i);
00049     virtual void onDChanged(double d);
00050     virtual void onTargetTempChanged(double temp);
00051     virtual void onManualPowerChanged(double pow);
00052     virtual void onHeaterModeChanged(int mode);
00053     virtual void onPowerRangeChanged(int range);
00054     virtual void onCurrentChannelChanged(const shared_ptr<XChannel> &ch);
00055     virtual void onExcitationChanged(const shared_ptr<XChannel> &ch, int exc);
00056 private:
00057 };

00059 //!Picowatt/Oxford AVS47-IB
00060 //!AVS47 and TS530A
00061 class XAVS47IB:public XCharDeviceDriver<XTempControl>
00062 {
00063     XNODE_OBJECT
00064 protected:
00065     XAVS47IB(const char *name, bool runtime,
00066              const shared_ptr<XScalarEntryList> &scalarentries,
00067              const shared_ptr<XInterfaceList> &interfaces,
00068              const shared_ptr<XThermometerList> &thermometers,
00069              const shared_ptr<XDriverList> &drivers);
00070 public:
00071     ~XAVS47IB() {}
00072 
00073 protected:
00074     virtual double getRaw(shared_ptr<XChannel> &channel);
00075     //! obtain current heater power
00076     //! \sa m_heaterPowerUnit()
00077     virtual double getHeater();
00078     //! ex. "W", "dB", or so
00079     virtual const char *m_heaterPowerUnit() {return "W";}
00080   
00081     //! Be called just after opening interface. Call start() inside this routine appropriately.
00082     virtual void open() throw (XInterface::XInterfaceError &);
00083     //! Be called for closing interfaces.
00084     virtual void afterStop();
00085   
00086     virtual void onPChanged(double p);
00087     virtual void onIChanged(double i);
00088     virtual void onDChanged(double d);
00089     virtual void onTargetTempChanged(double temp);
00090     virtual void onManualPowerChanged(double pow);
00091     virtual void onHeaterModeChanged(int mode);
00092     virtual void onPowerRangeChanged(int range);
00093     virtual void onCurrentChannelChanged(const shared_ptr<XChannel> &ch);
00094     virtual void onExcitationChanged(const shared_ptr<XChannel> &ch, int exc);
00095 private:
00096     double read(const char *str);
00097 
00098     void setTemp(double temp);
00099     void setHeaterMode(int /*mode*/) {}
00100     int setPoint();
00101     //AVS-47 COMMANDS
00102     int setRange(unsigned int range);
00103     double getRes();
00104     int getRange();
00105     //TS-530 COMMANDS
00106     int setBias(unsigned int bias);
00107     void setPowerRange(int range);
00108 
00109     int m_autorange_wait;
00110 };

00112 //!Cryo-con base class
00113 class XCryocon : public XCharDeviceDriver<XTempControl>
00114 {
00115     XNODE_OBJECT
00116 protected:
00117     XCryocon(const char *name, bool runtime,
00118              const shared_ptr<XScalarEntryList> &scalarentries,
00119              const shared_ptr<XInterfaceList> &interfaces,
00120              const shared_ptr<XThermometerList> &thermometers,
00121              const shared_ptr<XDriverList> &drivers);
00122 public:
00123     virtual ~XCryocon() {}
00124 
00125 protected:
00126     virtual double getRaw(shared_ptr<XChannel> &channel);
00127     //! obtain current heater power
00128     //! \sa m_heaterPowerUnit()
00129     virtual double getHeater();
00130     //! ex. "W", "dB", or so
00131     virtual const char *m_heaterPowerUnit() {return "%";}
00132   
00133     //! Be called just after opening interface. Call start() inside this routine appropriately.
00134     virtual void open() throw (XInterface::XInterfaceError &);
00135   
00136     virtual void onPChanged(double p);
00137     virtual void onIChanged(double i);
00138     virtual void onDChanged(double d);
00139     virtual void onTargetTempChanged(double temp);
00140     virtual void onManualPowerChanged(double pow);
00141     virtual void onHeaterModeChanged(int mode);
00142     virtual void onPowerRangeChanged(int range);
00143     virtual void onCurrentChannelChanged(const shared_ptr<XChannel> &ch);
00144     virtual void onExcitationChanged(const shared_ptr<XChannel> &ch, int exc);
00145 private:
00146     void setTemp(double temp);
00147     //        void SetChannel(XChannel *channel);
00148     void setHeaterMode();
00149     void getChannel();
00150     int control();
00151     int stopControl();
00152     double getInput(shared_ptr<XChannel> &channel);
00153     int setHeaterSetPoint(double value);
00154 };

00192 //!Neocera LTC-21.
00193 class XNeoceraLTC21:public XCharDeviceDriver<XTempControl>
00194 {
00195     XNODE_OBJECT
00196 protected:
00197     XNeoceraLTC21(const char *name, bool runtime,
00198                   const shared_ptr<XScalarEntryList> &scalarentries,
00199                   const shared_ptr<XInterfaceList> &interfaces,
00200                   const shared_ptr<XThermometerList> &thermometers,
00201                   const shared_ptr<XDriverList> &drivers);
00202 public:
00203     ~XNeoceraLTC21() {}
00204 
00205 protected:
00206     virtual double getRaw(shared_ptr<XChannel> &channel);
00207     //! obtain current heater power
00208     //! \sa m_heaterPowerUnit()
00209     virtual double getHeater();
00210     //! ex. "W", "dB", or so
00211     virtual const char *m_heaterPowerUnit() {return "%";}
00212   
00213     //! Be called just after opening interface. Call start() inside this routine appropriately.
00214     virtual void open() throw (XInterface::XInterfaceError &);
00215     
00216     virtual void onPChanged(double p);
00217     virtual void onIChanged(double i);
00218     virtual void onDChanged(double d);
00219     virtual void onTargetTempChanged(double temp);
00220     virtual void onManualPowerChanged(double pow);
00221     virtual void onHeaterModeChanged(int mode);
00222     virtual void onPowerRangeChanged(int range);
00223     virtual void onCurrentChannelChanged(const shared_ptr<XChannel> &ch);
00224     virtual void onExcitationChanged(const shared_ptr<XChannel> &ch, int exc);
00225 private:
00226     //! set the system into the control mode.
00227     void control();
00228     //! leave the control mode.
00229     void monitor();
00230     //! set PID, manual power.
00231     void setHeater();
00232 };
